Name: Syystem - The Phantom Train
About the game: Join Trixxy, the hacker mage from Capital City, in this paranormal mystery visual novel and scour the haunted subway tunnels in search of the rumored ghost train. Solve a variety of puzzles as you navigate the tunnels, go head to head with shady individuals, and unravel the secret behind the curse swallowing up the lives of hapless victims. Keep your wits about you and shine your flashlight everywhere--you never know when you'll find something tucked away in a dark corner. You won't be alone. Friends and enemies both Everyone has their own goals and motivations, but victory goes to the one who can see past the ghost train's tricks and traps. Interacting with them and solving the myriad of puzzles are only a few of the challenges Trixxy will face. Use the pointer to navigate and the keyboard to enter text Explore a series of interconnected subway lines Draw from real-world knowledge to help solve the riddles Deepen the trust between Trixxy and her friends so they can help you later Traverse conversational branches and multiple game paths Enjoy multiple endings And even if you do find the ghost train waiting for you at the end... can you survive it? Disclaimer/Developer's Notes This game is known to trigger a false positive for virus threats. Being an experienced hacker mage, Trixxy can easily overcome these feeble attempts to prevent her story from being told. In order to unravel the secrets of the ghost train, your first puzzle is to overcome the firewall/virus protection puzzle.
Developers: Sanctum Games - Powered by the Cactyys
